about_the_game:
Overview

In a distant land, the retired valiant knight, Sir William, renowned for his unwavering bravery and loyalty, embarks on an unexpected adventure when he stumbles upon a mysterious portal after a night at the pub. Accidentally falling through, he lands in the bewildering modern city of Old York, completely unaware that he's intruded into the perilous territory of a ruthless street gang led by the enigmatic Big B.O.B. Armed with his trusty sword and an unyielding spirit, Sir William doesn't back down from a challenge.

Instead of a duel, he challenges the gang members in a quest for more alcohol, setting off a chain of events that leads him to parry his way through the gritty streets of Old York. Join Sir William as he navigates the city, uncovering the depths of the Killer Serpents' crimes and the mystery behind his unexpected transportation, all while satisfying his unique quest for spirits and swords. It's a thrilling journey that combines chivalry, chaos, and a dash of liquid courage in a mesmerizing urban landscape.

Features

  • Dynamic Combat System: Utilize precise attacks, blocking, and parrying to masterfully fend off enemies. Add a bit of flair to your fights by engaging in the exclusive Drunk Dash ability when Sir William gets, shall we say, fortified.

  • Urban Adventure: Explore the sprawling streets of Old York, each filled with dangers, and hidden coin.

  • Mysterious Storyline: Uncover the secrets behind the Killer Serpents’ criminal empire and the mystical portal that brought you here in Old York.

  • Knightly Platforming: Leap, climb, and dash your way through challenging environments, with simple but engaging controls.

Controls

  • Move Right: D

  • Move Left: A

  • Jump: W / Space Bar

  • Climb: W

  • Attack: Left Mouse Button

  • Block: C

  • Parry: While Holding C, Press Left Mouse Button

  • Dash: While Drunk, Shift

    Special Codes (In Clues)

  • Unlock Rampage Mode = Sir William's favourite drink

  • Unlock All Levels = The leader of the Killer Serpents

  • Unlock Everything = One Word of The Killer Serpents' Dialogue

  • Reset Everything = Its just "Reset"

name: [K]night City
short_description: Parry your way through Old York with Sir William!
